dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, have you heard anything about this, uh, new public holiday initiative they've been talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, have you heard anything about this, uh, new public holiday initiative they've been talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, definitely! The Ministry of Labour and Social Protection actually weighed in on it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, definitely! The Ministry of Labour and Social Protection actually weighed in on it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Labour and Social Protection of the Population commented on the initiative to introduce a new public holiday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What's the word? Are we, like, getting another day off?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's the word? Are we, like, getting another day off?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Well, uh, not so fast. They basically said it's not really within *their* authority to approve new holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, uh, not so fast. They basically said it's not really within their authority to approve new holidays.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry stated that the approval of new public holidays is beyond its authority and requires coordination at the government level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not their call? So, who *does* make that decision then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not their call? So, who does make that decision then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. They, um, they clarified that approving new public holidays requires coordination at the *government level*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. They, um, they clarified that approving new public holidays requires coordination at the government level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry stated that the approval of new public holidays is beyond its authority and requires coordination at the government level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so it's bigger than just one ministry, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so it's bigger than just one ministry, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! They said their response was within their competence, but it's not the, you know, the final consolidated position of the government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! They said their response was within their competence, but it's not the, you know, the final consolidated position of the government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The Ministry of Labour and Social Protection of the Population issued a response within its area of competence. However, this response does not represent the consolidated position of the government, as the approval of new public holidays requires interdepartmental review and approval at the government level, as well as amendments to the Law 'On Holidays in the Republic of Kazakhstan'," the ministry said in response to an official inquiry from Tengrinews.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it needs, like, more review?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it needs, like, more review?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A lot more! It needs interdepartmental review, government approval, and even amendments to the "Law on Holidays in the Republic of Kazakhstan."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A lot more! It needs interdepartmental review, government approval, and even amendments to the Law on Holidays in the Republic of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the approval of new public holidays requires interdepartmental review and approval at the government level, as well as amendments to the Law 'On Holidays in the Republic of Kazakhstan'...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that sounds like a lot of red tape just for a day off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that sounds like a lot of red tape just for a day off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. But they did mention that a request from a deputy, Kenzhegul Seitzhan, is actually currently "under government consideration."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. But they did mention that a request from a deputy, Kenzhegul Seitzhan, is actually currently under government consideration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry added that the request from Mazhilis deputy Kenzhegul Seitzhan is currently under government consideration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so it's still, like, on the table then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so it's still, like, on the table then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it is! But they said a "final decision" will only be made once all those necessary procedures are, like, totally completed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it is! But they said a final decision will only be made once all those necessary procedures are, like, totally completed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "A final decision on the approval of the new public holiday will be made after all necessary procedures are completed in accordance with the established procedure," the Ministry concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Got it. So, don't clear your calendars just yet, folks!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Got it. So, don't clear your calendars just yet, folks!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Pretty much! But the conversation's still happening, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! But the conversation's still happening, I guess.
